Name: Redshift VR
About the game: Destroy crystals, unlock abilities, and unleash power-ups! Redshift VR will test your skills at precision and accuracy as you battle to stop your targets from reaching their destination. Throw discs with the right direction and speed to shatter crystals and earn points and medals. Can you reach the end? Features 8 unique power-ups, including: multi-disc, shockwave, and lightning Unlockable skills that are earned by gaining experience points 3 difficulties to master Online leaderboards for all difficulties Medals to earn and fill out your medal chest Secrets to find and unlock
Meta Title: Redshift VR: Nov 1, 2018, Sorcium Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Redshift VR? Check out the release date (Nov 1, 2018), developer insights from Sorcium Games, and a complete game summary.
